doc:
Thelma Todd https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thelma_Todd 0 Thelma Alice Todd (July 29, 1906 – December 16, 1935) was an American actress. Appearing in about 120 pictures between 1926 and 1935, she is best remembered for her comedic roles in films such as Marx Brothers' Monkey Business, Horse Feathers, and a number of Charley Chase's short comedies and co-starring with Buster Keaton and Jimmy Durante in Speak Easily. She also had roles in Wheeler and Woolsey farces and several Laurel and Hardy films, the last of which (The Bohemian Girl) featured her in a part that was truncated by her suspicious death at the age of 29. Thelma_Alice_Todd ( July_29_,_1906 – December_16_,_1935 ) was an_American_actress . Appearing in about_120_pictures between 1926_and_1935 , she is_best_remembered for her_comedic_roles in films such_as Marx_Brothers '_Monkey_Business , Horse_Feathers , and a_number of Charley_Chase 's_short_comedies and co-starring with Buster_Keaton and Jimmy_Durante in Speak Easily .
